stories.title: What is an opinionated product and why you should build one?
In new twist, private equity shares its windfall with hourly employees

stories.text:
SEEKING FREELANCERS | Mobile App Developer| Texas| REMOTE | Hourly ($60 - 90/h)

We are looking for an apple mobile app dev to create and work on our application we have gotten mocked up, and initially developed.

Main objectives of the platform: -The app is modeled after a Uber eats style UI, but for another purpose. -Users need to be able to scroll and enter into opportunities, very similar to how you would choose and purchase food from a restaurant on Uber Eats or other delivery platforms. -Users will need to be able to download materials and have the ability to authenticate their profile via an Instagram login extension feature.

If you are interested, we would love to go into every detail on a phone call or zoom call. Please email me at wil@bradleyroadmgmt.com
